evidence: The Dashen Super App is very impressive. It is fast, easy to use, and provides smooth access to all essential banking services. Money transfer, bill payment, balance check, and other features work efficiently without issues. The design is clean and user-friendly. Great step forward in digital banking ‚Äî keep up the good work, Dashen Bank!..

Seriously, what‚Äôs going on with this app? The "Pay to Beneficiary" option is completely disabled for Android users, yet iOS users get full access without restrictions. Why are Android users being treated like second class customers? It‚Äôs the same app, the same service, but clearly not the same experience. This kind of platform bias is unacceptable, either give everyone the same features or be transparent about why you‚Äôre limiting functionality. Right now, it just feels unfair and frustrating.
